metadata.name: Mystery Horse
metadata.description:
The name was inspired by a Twitter post from one of Maia's 'NFTKids' friends. 

This monochrome water colour painting was a project Maia spent a month creating using a 'grid' technique to hand draw the horse, then use a wet sponge and wet brush technique for the shading.

Resolution is 2300px by 3200px at 280ppi

Maia painted this at just 9 years old - turning 10 at the end of June 2022.
